invertShiftBehavior.name: Invert Shift Behavior
invertShiftBehavior.hint: If enabled, dice rolls will display a modifier dialog by default, and holding shift bypasses it.

addLevelToGunDamage.name: House Rule: Add Level to Gun Damage
addLevelToGunDamage.hint: Add the shooter's level to gun and grenade damage, like with other attacks.

enablePierce.name: House Rule: Enable Pierce
enablePierce.hint: Enables a version of the Pierce skill extrapolated from the videogame. If this is off, the Pierce quality has no effect.

autoDodge.name: Auto Dodge
autoDodge.hint: Tokens targeted by an attack will automatically make a dodge roll unless they're immune. Speeds play, but you miss the chance to spend FP to boost your dodge TN.
